about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Within seconds you will find yourself calmer with this magical experience. Begin on an old house deck at the edge of the inner coastal waters. The water lightly ripples through the tall green grass blades allowing you to find a sense of clarity and calm. Under the mossy trees on an old path leading to an abandoned mansion is where you will find yourself next. To finish this comforting immersion you will find yourself seated on a bench built into a gorgeous botanical walkway.

Purpose
Relaxation
Self reflection
Mindfulness
Self meditations

Length
10:40

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
